name: Jumping Opposites
description:
A 3D puzzle platformer made with the Unity game engine for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021 with the theme opposites.

Features
  • Dynamic controller support
  • Several configurable settings, like inverting camera controls
  • A small 3D puzzle platforming experience
  • Built for PC, Mac* and Linux*

* We hope the Mac and Linux builds work as we haven't been able to test them.

Team

https://frontliner2.itch.io/
https://powerkiddd.itch.io/

The development process

With work and all we both didn't have too much time to work on the project, and the theme made it difficult too. However, we are proud of what we were able to create in the time that we had, we hope you enjoy it too!
